text: Norman Lawrence "Norm" Crosby (September 15, 1927 - November 7, 2020) was an American comedian. He was known for co-hosting the Canadian television series Everything Goes. His nickname was The Master of Malaprop. On November 7, 2020, Crosby died of heart failure at his home in Los Angeles, California at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Interview, November 2010 * Interview December 27, 2014 in Ames Tribune Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Television personalities from Massachusetts Category:Actors from Boston Category:Comedians from Boston
title: Norm Crosby
